subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A day after the Mets’ trade for Carlos Gomez fell through, Houston acquired Gomez, pitcher Mike Fiers and a 2016 draft pick from the Milwaukee Brewers for four prospects.
snippet: A day after the Mets’ trade for Carlos Gomez fell through, Houston acquired Gomez, pitcher Mike Fiers and a 2016 draft pick from the Milwaukee Brewers for four prospects.
